overview: Manuel and Toni are two hustlers who sell their love - and their bodies -- to rich, lonely women. Blonde heiress Samantha is on to them, but will that stop her from falling in love? Can the two hot Euro studs change their ways, or will fiery young Samantha be just another notch in their belts?
tagline: He was a hustler who sold his love to rich, lonely women. She wanted the one part of him money couldn't buy.
title: Gigolos
